data.description:
Galaxy Kart is an arcade kart racing game focused on combat and the individual skill of each driver.

In a galaxy full of crazy racers, a frantic championship decides who is the best driver of all! üèÅ

# ENHANCE THE BATTLE WITH ITEMS AND SKILLS
Use the unique skills of each character and grab power-ups to make your way to the finish line.

{410540981575206}

# RACE IN DIFFERENT GALAXIES
Explore a wide variety of maps, whether in a quick match or a tournament.

{501982312521863}

# PERSONALIZE YOUR RACER & KART
Unlock new characters and karts and mix and match from a wide range of unique combinations.

{524981249930218}

# CHALLENGE YOUR OPPONENTS
Race against bots or compete with other players in online matches.

{407708242423661}

Galaxy Kart brings the ultimate racing experience, filled with boosted features, including:
- 18 Unique Courses
- 6 Tournaments
- 9 Characters with 9 unique skills
- 9 Power-Ups
- 4 Levels of Difficulties (Easy, Normal, Hard and Challenge)
- 6 Players Multiplayer Mode
- Voice-Chat

Immerse yourself in this energetic kart game and drive among the stars using the movements of your HANDS!

Gear up, strap in, and prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey through the COSMOS! üåå

changelog.change_log: Fixed fade problem for server in MP.

Optimization
Fire particle fixed.
New PSO Caching

Update 1.16
Three New Maps!
Big Top
Valhalla Valley
Pirate's Treasure

New Game Mode! Galaxy Tournament!
Play for points through 3 consecutive tracks to win!
Six Different Galaxy Tournaments:
Condor
Andromeda
Cygnus
Centauro
Sombrero
RedShift

New UI
Better UI for During End of Race
Brand New UI for Tournament Mode

Music Rework
New music for some older tracks
Now the music gets faster during the last lap

Bug Fixes
Reworked voice chat for better stability

New 3 levels.
Several other minor updates

Fixed loading screen
Improved performance in some levels
Fixed Multiplayer
